segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Jack in Room 606 . Can you change the room for me ? It's too noisy . My friend was woken up several times by the noise from upstairs . He said it was too much for him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm awfully sorry , sir . I do apologize . A ten-year-old boy and a mother live upstairs . Maybe the boy is a little bit naughty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , I'd like to change our room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , sir . We'll manage it .
segments.speaker: S1
